Package subsetsum

Class SubsetSum

  • java.lang.Object
    • subsetsum.SubsetSum
  • public class SubsetSum
extends java.lang.Object
    * /** * * Proceed the csv data for selection by using recursion * * * * @author Foothill College, Zhili Zhao * * * *

    First is to input the data to initialize with the static variable in findSubset
    * * then send to the list generater to generate every possible combination for use
    * last is to compare to data with the store of cloest data while if complete match just break param recurisionArra store the every combinition of data
